CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 肩膀；肩胛骨；上背部；肩关节；（衣服的）肩部；（容器或物体的）肩状部分；（道路的）边缘地带；（车行道两侧的）紧急停车道；（山脉的）较低部分；担当能力；承担责任的能力
承担（责任、负担）；扛；背；扛起；肩扛；用肩部挑起（或承载物品）；用肩膀推开（人群或障碍物）；挤过；推挤

word_group.brief_definition: 着手大干起来；全力以赴
word_group.phrase: put your shoulder to the wheel

word_group.brief_definition: 肩并肩；齐心协力地；朝共同目标行动

bilingual.source: Your shoulder is at the top of your arm.
bilingual.target: 你的肩膀在手臂的顶部。
她靠在他的肩膀上哭泣。

bilingual.source: He hung the bag on his shoulder.
He used his shoulder to ram the door.
He rammed the door with his shoulder.

list.abstract: 《Shoulder》是由歌手Building 429演唱的一首英文歌曲，于20008年10月21日发行，收录于专辑《Building 429》中。

yingyinNormal.en: That depends how much longer do you plan on fondling my shoulder?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这取决于，你打算在我的肩膀上抚摸多久？

yingyinNormal.en: But if you are looking for a shoulder to cry on, use a pillow!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但如果你们想找个能靠着哭的肩膀，去找个枕头。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. I slipped in the shower, and I think I dislocated my shoulder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。我在浴缸里滑倒了，我觉得肩膀好像脱臼了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, my God, what the hell does this have to do with my stupid shoulder?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天哪，这些跟我这该死的肩膀又有什么该死的关系。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I look back over my shoulder to see if I'm being followed. And I'm breathing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后从肩膀上往后看，有没有人跟踪，然后呼吸。

yingyinNormal.en: We have to fill these out. Describe illness or injury. I dislocated my shoulder. All right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得先填表格。请描述病情和伤情情况。肩膀脱臼。好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, well, he was being a hero last night. He dislocated his shoulder saving a kid from the bus crash.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，他昨晚十分英勇，救下车祸中的孩子，导致肩膀脱臼。

yingyinNormal.en: The shoulder's frayed. It's falling to bits. And this! It's a ridiculous, old-fashioned joke!
yingyinNormal.zh: 肩膀都磨烂了，都破成一片一片的了，还有这儿。可笑又过时，简直是个笑话！

yingyinNormal.en: Seems like somebody needs something from you. Oh, no. He's just trying to pull my shoulder out of its socket.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看起来某个人需要你的某个部件。噢, 不是. 他只是试着把我的肩膀拽脱臼。

yingyinNormal.en: Penny, I have an eidetic memory. Also, that's a picture of you in the passenger seat holding your dislocated shoulder. Mmm, no, it isn't.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩妮，我记得很清楚，而且摄像头也拍下了你在副驾驶位置上托着你那脱臼的肩膀。才不是呢。

yingyinNormal.en: I say you tell Alex your heart belongs to Penny, I provide her a shoulder to cry on, and then roughly half a year later I give it to her good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得你应该告诉她，你只爱佩妮，然后我借肩膀给她哭诉，然后差不多半年后，我就能给她"来一发"了。

yingyinNormal.en: The other day she said she was self-conscious about the beauty mark on her shoulder, and I said, "You know, you can call that a beauty mark all you want. When there's hair growing out of it, that's a mole."
yingyinNormal.zh: 有一天她说觉得难为情因为肩膀上有颗美人印，而我说，“随你美化你那个美人印但当它上面长了根毛，那它就是个痣。”

yingyinNormal.en: Bring me the first branch your shoulder brushes on your journey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给我带回第一支划过你肩头的树枝。

yingyinNormal.en: Yup. He's pretty great. I assume you and Shoulder Blades are clanned up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错。他超厉害的。所以你和大块头是组队的。

yingyinNormal.en: Even with all that gear on your shoulder, you won't last a night. Not by yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 况且你肩上的装备连一晚上都支撑不了，你一个人更不可能。

yingyinNormal.en: Not looking over your shoulder for Veronica. Don't hate. I helped design Veronica.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不必惦记着维罗妮卡。别生气，是我帮着设计了维罗妮卡。

yingyinNormal.en: I hope I get some serious burns. I'm hoping for some mauling, like on my shoulder or back.
yingyinNormal.zh: 希望我被火烧得很严重，希望我的肩背被抓得血肉模糊。

yingyinNormal.en: So you know what? I really like those jackets with the shoulder pads in them. Where are those?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真的很喜欢那些有垫肩的外套在哪边有呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I've always been looking over my shoulder, always expecting to see the grim figure of... Death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直都小心提防着，以为会见到冷酷的……死神。

yingyinNormal.en: You don't know what it's like to go through life looking over your shoulder. Having secrets no one would understand.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你不知道过日子还得随时小心翼翼是什么滋味。背负没人能理解的秘密。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: accept as a burden or duty

examination_example.sentence: To some extent the housing sector must <highlight>shoulder</highlight> the blame.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，住房部门必须承担责任。

sense_info_list.en: the part of the body of a person or animal where the arm or foreleg joins the body

word_usage.usage:
shoulder作“承担；担负”讲，为及物动词，多接名词或代词作宾语，如：
to shoulder the responsibility for sth.
对某事承担责任

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: accept as a burden or duty

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, children are the focus of many families, <highlight>shouldering</highlight> the hope of their parents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，儿童是许多家庭的焦点，肩负着父母的希望。

examination_example.sentence: What's more, young people should also <highlight>shoulder</highlight> their responsibility and only forward official information released by the relevant departments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更何况，年轻人也要肩负起自己的责任，只转发有关部门发布的官方信息。

sense_info_list.en: the part of the body of a person or animal where the arm or foreleg joins the body

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

sense_info_list.en: the part of the body of a person or animal where the arm or foreleg joins the body
accept as a burden or duty

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: A lunchtime escape allows her to keep a boss from tapping her on the <highlight>shoulder</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 午餐时间的逃跑让她避免了老板拍她的肩膀。

examination_example.sentence: Rushing out gratefully I called out over my <highlight>shoulder</highlight>, "By the way, what's your name? "
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我满怀感激地冲了出去，背过肩喊道：“顺便问一下，你叫什么名字？”

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Dolly, the little girl, patted my <highlight>shoulder</highlight> without fear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多莉，那个小女孩，毫无畏惧地拍了拍我的肩膀。

examination_example.sentence: Backpacks should never be worn over just one <highlight>shoulder</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 双肩包不应该只挎在一个肩膀上。

examination_example.sentence: At present, the girl is able to support the home with her weak <highlight>shoulder</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，这个女孩已经可以用她脆弱的肩膀肩负起起这个家了。
